scene.name: Dining tray preparation setup
scene.description: A desk with an empty serving tray and various dining items like a bowl, a cup, and a set of utensils

task.name: Prepare dining tray
task.description: Arrange all dining items neatly onto the tray for serving
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will prepare the dining tray. Please place the bowl, cup, and utensils onto the tray.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要准备堂食托盘。请将碗、杯子和餐具摆放到托盘内。

subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Start placing items on the tray.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：开始向托盘摆放物品。

steps.description: Start preparing the dining tray by placing items one by one
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: start preparing the tray.

constraints.notes: Ensure items are balanced to prevent the tray from tipping when lifted; place liquids carefully to avoid spills.
